[System Prompt]
This is an operation you must perform and return the output values. Neither, the methodology, extra sentences nor the code are needed.  
Input formatting: Explanation of the Input (variable_name) (type) = value

[Information]
Personality Information of Famous People (personality_examples) (dict[str, Personality]) = {
    'Barack Obama': Personality.EXTROVERT
}

[Inputs  Information]
Person Object (person) (Person) = Person(name="Albert Einstein", age=78)

[Output  Information]
Personality of the Person (Personality)

[Type Explanations]
Person (Person) (Class) = (Name of the Person (name) (str), Age of the Person (age) (int))
Personality of the Person (Personality) (Enum) = (Person who is shy and reticent (INTROVERT) (EnumItem), Person who is outgoing and socially confident (EXTROVERT) (EnumItem) )

[Action]
Get the Personality of the Person

Generate and return the output result(s) only, adhering to the provided Type in the following format

[Output] <result>
